It's the shade Fire Rose, and oh my, it lives up to its Glam Tint name! This tint gives such a gorgeous shine, coating your lips with a moist, glossy finish. You might wonder about its longevity, but as long as you avoid extremely oily foods, it actually holds up pretty well. The glossy finish stays intact too! When applied alone, it brings out its true color beautifully, effortlessly complementing any mood or style. This is the first tint I've used that leaves such a satisfying finish, and believe me, I've tried many! But Clio Vintage Apple is a true gem; I was amazed when I used it all up! 

I've been searching for a daily, easy-to-wear red with warmth, so when I heard this was a must-have for warm tones, I had to get it right away! And let me tell you, it didn't disappoint! The moment I tried it, I was blown away! It's incredibly moisturizing, with a stunning shine, and the color, true to its name, is a beautiful vintage apple red with a clear tone-down effect. It's so pretty! Plus, it has a slight tint, making it perfect for summer tints. Ever since I bought it, it's become my go-to essential for outingsâ€”can't leave home without it!
